subject: RE: [junit] Junit and RMI, please help ...
msgSnippet: Sam, ... this is only a hint for the GC and may leed to no operations at all, depending on the implementation of the VM. (Since 1.3 or 1.4 Sun recommends not
messageBody:
Sam,

> called System.gc()

this is only a hint for the GC and may leed to
no operations at all, depending on the implementation of
the VM. (Since 1.3 or 1.4 Sun recommends not to use it at all)

Bernd
